SELECT (case when COUNT(*) = 0 then 'library_001' when COUNT(*) < 9 then CONCAT('library_00',(MAX(CONVert(SUBSTR(library_code,9), SIGNED INTEGER))+1)) when COUNT(*) < 99 then CONCAT('library_0',(MAX(CONVert(SUBSTR(library_code,9), SIGNED INTEGER))+1)) when COUNT(*) < 999 then CONCAT('library_',(MAX(CONVert(SUBSTR(library_code,9), SIGNED INTEGER))+1)) ELSE CONCAT('library_',(max(CONVert(SUBSTR(library_code,9), SIGNED INTEGER))+1)) END) AS library_code FROM tb_library
